Articles.Content: Ive been with KSP for almost a year and would like to congratulate the team on all the change I have seen personally. I personally remember my first succesful flights being halfway round the world suborbital flights, Then adding the map view and now EVA\'s. KSP Team I lova ya.
Its funny. Sounds like your progression through the alpha stages of the game (I am a much newer here) matches what the campaign will one day be like.
